messages.message: Gotcha! We correct for skew to help with extraction. I hear you that the visual changes in this case look a bit extreme. @Rakesh does the skew rotation take place only for single page docs?

Yes, there is a ocr based alignment rotation (angle for extracted words) that we do - this is based on average rotation angle across words. There are some thresholds for rotation as well. It is at a page level - not limited to single page docs.
 cc: @Gaurav Saini
